website_summaries.verdict: These Fisherman sandals are lighter than the Jensen Fisherman at a higher price.
pros: A more stylish version of the Fisherman sandal
These leather sandals are a great choice for comfortable, casual summer wear
Solid construction should last for years
cons: Ankle strap is a bit low
Not enough cushion for some customers

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Fisherman Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of Clarks and my first pair of fisherman sandals and I love them. The footbed is super soft and really comfortable, especially on bare feet. While it is hard to tell in photos, the leather is extremely soft and supple. They are light and really flexible. I usually wear new shoes around the house to decide if I want to keep them or not. After awhile, I forgot that I had these on. I dont know how they will hold up in the long run, since I have not had them very long and have not started to wear them outside much, but so far I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: A very nice sandal
customer_reviews.text: My feet are 10.5. I chose 11 in case these ran smaller, but that's not the case. 10 would have been the right size. That said, that rear strap holds my feet fine and the sandal is most comfortable. More light weight than I expected, but that's a plus for the warm summer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Meu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Clark sandals are well-made and long-time favorites for my husband (5 stars rating). Sadly, this pair was quite a bit larger than the ones we were replacing (of the same size). AND, I didn't realize that, if you buy from Amazon through a 3rd party vendor, you have to pay return shipping (1 star rating). So, we have sandals that don't fit and basically have to pay postage for the chance to have tried them on. (net of 3 stars) Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband since our puppy ate his old ones and came across Clark's. The look is just what he wanted. So many of these fisherman shoes buckle on the side of the ankle. We were pleased to see that this one did not. It has velcro on the back to adjust. I can't get them off of him. Bed is very soft, hardly needs to be broken in at all. The look makes it casual tho. You wouldn't go out to the clubs with these. Also, Clark's are very well made so I expect these will last him as long as the doomed puppy doesn't find them!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen clarke

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight for 'high arch' feet
customer_reviews.text: Despite the size 10 being the proper size for me, my foot 'arch' is considered 'high arch' and my previous sandals had an elastic band ligament on the first leather strip and that helped a lot to fit my foot in. This set hasn't and despite my foot enters in the the sandal, it's not fully comfortable because it feels tight. I guess, with time and use, it will lose a bit. Anyway I'm pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CADS

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but practical sandal
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a sandal that was sturdy but comfortable, covered the ends of my toes but let air flow around my foot. Good arch support was also important. This fulfilled all my needs. Good looking too (IMHO).
customer_reviews.author: Robert O Bourdeau

customer_reviews.title: Over 2 months of heavy summer use and Clarks Sandals are doing just fine!
customer_reviews.text: The Clark's Men's Swing Sky Fisherman Sandal Size 9 fit very well. The sandal has survived several miles of walking through wet sandy conditions without any sole or leather strap separation like cheaper Wal-Mart sandals do. My favorite feature so far is the front leather strap which covers my toes. Many times, this has saved my feet from painful injury while bumping them into rocks and metal objects while in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Gathright

customer_reviews.title: good fit comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried the shoes on... I was concerned about the slipperiness of the soles. Even while sitting down the sandals seemed to skid around both my wooden floors and the rug. However, once I had walked around a bit the bottoms were scuffed up enough to gain good purchase without the sliperry effect. The sandals are light and comfortable. Still new, so durability remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a very nice shoe and Do want to keep it
customer_reviews.text: The top strap is not long enough and is not adjustable. I cannot get my foot all the way in and there is a 3/4 inch gap between where my toes are and where thy should be. I cannot find a shoe repair so I may try and cut the strap to lengthen it with a lace. Otherwise, it is a very nice shoe and Do want to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Lind

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent sandals with little to no arch support (which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second pair of them. They are excellent sandals with little to no arch support (which is precisely what I need since arch support hurts my feet). I wear them every day to college, and walk a considerable distant around the campus every day. They have lasted about a year before needing replacement. Would recommend buying them.
customer_reviews.author: AM87

customer_reviews.title: These are great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: First off they are light as a feather .Secondly when you put them on your feet will became happy the lining is luxurious and last but not least they look great not that fake leather look. These Sandals will be staple in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: rocketman1957

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are comfortable, affordable, and look great. I'm on my 3rd pair and will keep ordering as long as they are around.
customer_reviews.author: Skibdibbly

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Little support
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing a pair of Clarks Un that as far as style and look goes, were much the same. The most significant difference between the two are the different levels of support. From that aspect alone, the UN's are a much better Sandal. Peace and every good always Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Carroll, OFS

customer_reviews.title: Picture looks finer than the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I received the shipmen on time as expected. This sandal is thinner and less supportive as the picture led you to believe. Its size is smaller than average size 10. I haven't worn it long enough to assess its comfort. Will provide another update.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by the quality
customer_reviews.text: i bought this pair about one year ago and i don't ware them much. but the velcro is already not sticking together as it should be. With the brand name and the price, i would expect it to last at least a couple of years. i would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chunnan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight and looks good. Bought an 11D for my 10.5E foot (the 11D is wider than the 10.5D) and have worn them twice for extended periods. Hoping the pressure of my fat foot will not blow out the side of the sandal for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you keep in mind what you spent on these, you will be happy with the quality and comfort. I was. You should not compare them to a $125 pair of Merrells or Keens (of course they are more comfortable). But, overall, these fit as expected, look good, and are comfortable. I find the strap works well and they serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes... I'd buy them again. After buying them, I'm not crazy about the strap in the back, because you can't just slip these sandals on and go. But the comfort and the fit or the sandals more then overcome that small issue and I still give them a solid 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: R. Metoyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well and came 2 days early!! Out of the box they have a little shine to them but nothing that is unbearable. Fit perfect and snug and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reno

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality. Months later had quality issues and ended up throwing them in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are a good quality and fit comfortably and are very light. They are becoming my "go to" footwear both indoors and out. The sale price made them unbeatable value. I liked the closed toe design.
customer_reviews.author: daves

customer_reviews.title: If you need them for less than 5 months , buy them if not Buy J&M much better and lasted for more than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Sandals expecting they will last for a year at least , but these Sandals lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Perez

customer_reviews.title: not as good quality as I had expected from Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Sent these back--like the DOCKER'S sandals much better. They don't have good cushioning in them at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clark quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fisherman sandals. Clark quality fit and materials. The strap could angled higher to ride a bit higher on the ankle, but this in no way detracts from the excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Hannen

customer_reviews.title: ... on the big side but by far the most comfortable and coolest sandal I own
customer_reviews.text: A little on the big side but by far the most comfortable and coolest sandal I own.
customer_reviews.author: Bodacious

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sandal, however it's not as comfortable as my Dockers fisherman sandals. The sole is a cheap sort of plastic, not very durable looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jo, by the sea.

customer_reviews.title: I think Clarks makes the most comfortable, quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my 85-year old father. He loves it. I think Clarks makes the most comfortable, quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: He says they're comfortable and fit really great
customer_reviews.text: My husbands uses these a whole lot in the summer. He says they're comfortable and fit really great!
customer_reviews.author: jgonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all round comfort from the first wear. Clarks are always generous for size and once you realize this ordering is easy.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Well made shoe
customer_reviews.text: Clarks never disappoints with quality. If you have an average size foot this style will be a bit wide but not enough to affect function.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: shoddy
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart at the first sign of rain. What good is that, at any price? Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: gmtenor

customer_reviews.title: Just what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partner to replace an old old pair of similar sandals. He has narrow size 12 feet, so finding shoes that fit can be a challenge. These fit perfectly from the time he put them on. They are lightweight with soft but durable soles. A total win!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Bryant

customer_reviews.title: For my son.
customer_reviews.text: He loves them. He wanted a pair like his brother's but they were a past season. These are even better. Good things come to those who wait.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen A

customer_reviews.title: Clarks should put these back into production
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable sandal. Clarks doesn't make them anymore, but I was lucky to find a pair on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marc of Venice

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has a low profile, like a woman's shoe. Has no arch support. Not very pleased with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Sandals marked size 10, but too large. Returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Sandals marked size 10, but too large. Returned and full refund with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Classy looking for a sandal. My husband says very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K Garner

customer_reviews.title: Love the dark lining
customer_reviews.text: Clark's brand well known for quality, got these for my husband and he LOVES them. Dark lining does not discolor with sweat, so,they stay looking new
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband who currently owns the same sandals and wears them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: They fit quite comfortably; and I would recommend them to anyone wanting a pair of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long and slim.
customer_reviews.text: That's it. That's all. I ordered a 9, and their 9s are a little longer than I thought, but are slimmer than my feet. Maybe I just have wide feet. It doesn't matter much, the leather has a bit of play, and I can get my feet in, and stay comfortable. Either way, I like them, and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bassanova

customer_reviews.title: The metal clips bend easy (on the heel)
customer_reviews.text: Broke the 2nd day I wore them. The metal clips bend easy (on the heel).
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the product and the prompt service that has ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product and the prompt service that has been given to me. Thank You Fred Perez a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: fred l perez

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! Fits comfortably and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: My husband told me these are very comfortable and appreciates the purchase for him.
customer_reviews.author: Gratefulshopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fits good.
customer_reviews.text: They feel good as you walk around. Wish the leather (or is it?) was a bit softer.
customer_reviews.author: Venki

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it runs a little large but a smaller size ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it runs a little large but a smaller size would be to small. Great sandal and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Robbins

customer_reviews.title: I buy these Clark men,
customer_reviews.text: I buy these Clark men,s swing sky for my husband he loves the them he is in Jamaica he got them today
customer_reviews.author: marjorie  bennett

customer_reviews.title: may order another pair for next summer...
customer_reviews.text: worn these a lot over the summer in yard , very comfortable for me...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a Roman Gladiato , again.
customer_reviews.text: Slight discomfort with strap, shoe is comfortable. I'll get used to the strap adjustment No one has commented on them, but thats probably because I look like I've always had well-fitting sandles.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can wear them all day if I apply moleskin on the rear straps.
customer_reviews.author: David Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: great pair of sandals
customer_reviews.text: The first pair, size 11 was way too big, but this pair fits perfectly! Very comfortable and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Vita

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: If they were wider we would have kept them :(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lam

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great price , fast shipping, very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip  Henderson

customer_reviews.title: A great summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about footwear. I need a shoe that has good structure and a decent arch support. I usually buy Birkenstock shoes, but have also owned several pair of Clarks in the past. I must confess that the price was a consideration in buying these, but the Clarks name convinced me that the shoes would be of good quality. I was not disappointed. They are comfortable to walk in, and fit perfectly. Now all I need is some warm weather in New England so I can really use them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals! I was looking for a pair to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals! I was looking for a pair to replace a worn out set. These are easy to wear and I actually like the velcro heal strap.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Sample Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a fathers day gift, my Dad loves them
customer_reviews.author: Edla Arruda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sandal and Fit
customer_reviews.text: Saw this shoe at the local sporting goods store at twice the price. Delivery arrived as stated. New sandal in the proper shoe box. Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfy, but wish I had ordered a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: BAgoatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clarks shoes are reliable and great quality; can't be happier with fit or feel
customer_reviews.author: Sandra  Jones

customer_reviews.title: I used these sandals less than 6 weeks with minimal ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these sandals less than 6 weeks with minimal use and the straps are pulling away from the soles! Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is well designed and is very easy to put on and fasten. It maintains its position well in walking and remains comfortable even for long periods..I have no hesitation in he. recommending this sandal .
customer_reviews.author: george mundel

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great and just as I expected they would be, Great price and comfortable. Can't wait to try them fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Wickline

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sandals for my husband. Loves them so much, he had me order a spare pair for when these wear out. Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.author: LovinAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Clark's shoes for 50 years, so was very disappointed to find a white substance on the heel strap and strap closest to the heel. It looked like white mold growing in the leather. I took a wet rag to see if it would wipe off, and the finish of the shoe went from a satin shine to dull, so the shoe's finish is now two-toned. A lot of brown dye came off on the rag. I'm not sure if the mold or whatever will grow back. The footbed is flat, with no arch support, and were made in India. I would not recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sandals are comfortable and do not hurt my feet when talking long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is SO conservative... 60 yrs old and has never owned a pair of sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby whined when they came but he LOVES them! Wore them daily on vacation and he said they felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Z. Gesmond

customer_reviews.title: The shipper did a great job. All in all a fantastic experiencs
customer_reviews.text: It was as i expected,Clarks is a proven commodity,very reliable.The shipper did a great job.All in all a fantastic experiencs.
customer_reviews.author: Merkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pair of Clarks for a long time. These are very comfortable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Champion

customer_reviews.title: Too big for number 8
customer_reviews.text: My brother likes this sandal but for some reason this time the number 8 was somewhat large.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: ... loves them so far and he normally dose not like sandals, but is very please with shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them so far and he normally dose not like sandals, but is very please with shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied wit this
customer_reviews.text: little bit large. But OK. I'm satisfied wit this purchase
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, he loves Clarks. He said they are very comfortable and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sukey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The answers were given by my husband as these are his shoes
customer_reviews.author: Patsy  McClintck

customer_reviews.title: run large
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 12 in Clarks dress shoes. The 12 in this sandal is to big by a half size.
customer_reviews.author: kovfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and look good too. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: good fit. Just quality sandals
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, good fit. Just quality sandals. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Truthteller

customer_reviews.title: Good feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Love 2 put this on. Feels good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Nwuko

customer_reviews.title: Merchandise and service was fine being required to write this review is unfair to sellers
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product and Seller a 5 star rating because it was earned. I give this stupid requirement to write a review no stars because a star rating in most cases says all I care to say. I feel strongly that many more people would review if they could do so with a couple of clicks.
customer_reviews.author: Martin McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Fine!
customer_reviews.text: First time in my life I wear gorgeous, soft, comfortable sandals that do not rub your feet without socks!! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anton Naydenov

customer_reviews.title: He wears them almost everyday 'cos he feels it's so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad and he loves it. He wears them almost everyday 'cos he feels it's so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: OLABISI OLADELE

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband & he's very satisfied. Just what we've come to expect from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marotta

customer_reviews.title: Quality is a bit below normal
customer_reviews.text: The quality of material seems like a bit below the other Clark sandals that I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Ng Yam Boon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a double E I got a regular size to tight
customer_reviews.author: melvin christopher

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: The sole is made of plastic and is dangerously slippery on carpet and hard floors. Looks good, though. I won't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: POPS

customer_reviews.title: After "shipping, handling", and "restocking fee", I ...
customer_reviews.text: After "shipping, handling", and "restocking fee", I barely go anything back when I had to return them due to being too big. If you order these shoes, get a full size smaller....
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Swing Sky Sandals Run Large
customer_reviews.text: I tried on size 9 Clarks Swing Bay sandals at the Clarks outlet store and they fit OK. Since they weren't eligible for Prime shipping, I ordered the Swing Sky model thinking they would fit the same. But, they were too large and the sale price was no longer available so I returned them for refund. I then ordered Teva sandals and they are great. I gave the Clarks a 3-star neutral rating. The quality looked good but I didn't wear them except for trying them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have very strange impression of these Fisherman Sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I have very strange impression of these Fisherman Sandal. when I pulled it out of the box ... I didn’t like it at all! and if I was in the U.S., I immediately would sent it back! But now I’m in Ukraine and I had to wear it. sandals are very comfortable, sole is soft and comfortable to walk on the whole, a rise a little low, but they stretch very good and they look good. I got few compliments. but if it’s out of leather that leather has a very poor quality. Besides, it has a synthetic lining ... I don’t like it!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: No support, not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, fine if you just use them to stand around the pool, but they're not for walking. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: bye bye bye

customer_reviews.title: Not up to usual Clark quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits good enough, but has a very hard plastic (?) sole, and isn't up to the quality you expect from Clark
customer_reviews.author: CCRider

customer_reviews.title: No cushion
customer_reviews.text: The sandal looks sleek and it fit well. However, if you have any feet issues, then you may have to think about this sandal. Its got very little cushion, but again most sandals don't have much give anyways. I added an sole insert to the sandal (which is a bit odd for a sandal). Overall its good
customer_reviews.author: Priya Vengurlekar

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I felt the product was of poor quality for the price, they are cheap in appearance. I would not recommend or buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Wright

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Have had many shoes of this brand, these fit different
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived in timely fashion. Easy fit and well designed for walking in warmer climate. Appearance was my reason for purchase. Look forward to Summer use.
customer_reviews.author: James Harrington

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Swing Sky Fisherman Sandal
product_meta.description: Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: Full grain leather uppers are soft and flexible
